cause.description:
Oregon Peaceworks is a non-profit organization focused on directing public policy toward peace at the local, regional, national and global levels.
1. Well-informed citizens empowered to take action to create the world in which they want to live.
2. Positive long-term public policies rather than short-term politically or economically motivated solutions.
3. A world in which the resources of the earth are protected, conserved and shared equitably
4. If you want to donate, go to http://www.oregonpeaceworks.org/site/index.php?option=content&task=view&id=758&Itemid=69 instead of using the donate butt
cause.mission: To educate and activate people to work for peace, justice and environmental sustainability.
cause.name: Oregon Peaceworks
